statement.name: createAllTables
statement.sql: {create_table_prefix} track ( id VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, artist VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, album VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, time INTEGER, track_number INTEGER, file VARCHAR(1024) NOT NULL, suffix VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL, protected BOOLEAN, video {datatype_boolean}, source VARCHAR(20), genre VARCHAR(255), UNIQUE (id) )
{create_table_prefix} playlist ( id VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, type VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, track_count INTEGER, UNIQUE (id) )

{create_table_prefix} link_track_playlist ( idx INTEGER, track_id VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, playlist_id VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT fk_linktrackplaylist_trackid FOREIGN KEY (track_id) REFERENCES track (id) ON DELETE CASCADE, CONSTRAINT fk_linktrackplaylist_playlistid FOREIGN KEY (playlist_id) REFERENCES playlist (id) ON DELETE CASCADE )
{create_table_prefix} system_information ( lastupdate BIGINT, version VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL )
{create_table_prefix} album ( name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, first_char VARCHAR(1), track_count INTEGER, artist_count INTEGER, artist VARCHAR(255) )
{create_table_prefix} artist ( name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, first_char VARCHAR(1), track_count INTEGER, album_count INTEGER )
{create_table_prefix} genre ( name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, first_char VARCHAR(1), track_count INTEGER, album_count INTEGER, artist_count INTEGER )
{create_table_prefix} image ( track_id VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, size INTEGER NOT NULL, data {image_datatype} NOT NULL, UNIQUE (track_id, size) )
